title: Shoda - Soda for Gutsy People
meta_description: Discover the refreshing taste of Shoda, focused on gut health, featuring low-calorie, big-flavor drinks made with natural ingredients.

primary.heading: Live Gutsy
primary.second_body: Our soda is made with real fruit juice and a touch of cane sugar. We never use artificial sweeteners or high fructose corn syrup. Try all five flavors and find your favorite!

text_group.heading: Gut-Friendly Goodness
text_group.body: Our soda is packed with prebiotics and 1 billion probiotics, giving your gut the love it deserves. Say goodbye to bloating and hello to a happy, healthy digestive system with every sip.

text_group.heading: Light Calories, Big Flavor
text_group.body: Indulge in bold, refreshing taste without the guilt. At just 20 calories per can, you can enjoy all the flavor you crave with none of the compromise.

text_group.heading: Naturally Refreshing
text_group.body: Made with only the best natural ingredients, our soda is free from artificial sweeteners and flavors. It’s a crisp, clean taste that feels as good as it tastes, giving you a boost of real, natural refreshment.
